title: Blended Learning Research Trends and Professional Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning environment and experience in utilizing mobile learning tools
context.additional_context: Research-based blended learning strategy design and evaluation competency enhancement for professionals (medical/legal/technical).

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze the nine core themes of blended learning (learner outcomes, interaction, technology integration, etc.) and explain research trends.
Learners will be able to propose research-based strategies for designing blended learning optimized for mobile environments.
Learners will be able to develop and evaluate a blended learning implementation model suitable for small expert groups.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
